TRANSMISSION | Interview with the President @Lenin Moreno by @CNNEE, watch it by https://t.co/Un9jbBAY6n # LenínEnCNN
RT @ComunicacionEc: Start interview with the President @Lenin Moreno, by @camilocnn, @CNNEE | # LenínEnCNN. We tell you the topics ...
"These months of government have been hectic but very satisfactory, due to the large number of objectives that are being achieved", # LenínEnCNN
"The only thing I am doing is what responds to my ideological conviction", # LenínEnCNN
"I respond to a principle that generated the Constitution of Montecristi", # LenínEnCNN
The 2008 Constitution has wonderful principles, which have even been references for other constitutions in the world, # LenínEnCNN
1/2 "That's why I want to go back to that Constitution, which had a group of idealistic young people ...", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... militants of left parties, which brought the dialectical materialist conception of life", # LenínEnCNN
"The dialectic imposes changes, otherwise it would not be dialectical", # LenínEnCNN
"The human being is designed to change, anatomically, physiologically, psychologically, spiritually is designed to change", # LenínEnCNN
1/2 "I'm not too worried about uncertainties either; human beings are sometimes full of certainties, we want certainty ... ", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... certainties sometimes become prisons that damage, distort", # LenínEnCNN
"You have to learn to accept the daily contingency: every day is different from the previous one", # LenínEnCNN
Interview with the President @Lenin Moreno by @CNNEE, watch him on Facebook Live | # LenínEnCNN https://t.co/cgyQ1dZ97j
"The moment we become accustomed to a single form of behavior, we end up imprisoned in them", # LenínEnCNN
"I met Rafael Correa as a young man full of enthusiasm, fond of that Constitution and principles", ... https://t.co/DbiuvdHcXM
1/2 "That Rafael Correa was changing with time and, suddenly, what he manifested about the alternability ...", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... which is specified in the Constitution of Montecristi, became a kind of obsession to maintain power", # LenínEnCNN
I think that was the purpose and the problem of having left me the post ", # LenínEnCNN
1/2 "He (Rafael Correa) came to insistently ask me to be his candidate for president ...", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... he told me that the revolution had no other way to continue, that the people needed me, that he needed a successor ...", # LenínEnCNN
"He gave me a panorama of a country that I did not know about; I worked exclusively in the social area, there I dedicated myself "... https://t.co/zMmZZhROPp
"An economic, political panorama quite convenient, supposedly, to be able to adequately exercise the Government", # LenínEnCNN
1/2 "But the moment I arrived at the Government, the moment we won the elections and I started to inform myself of all ...", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... those things that were half encrypted, that moment I realized that the situation was very difficult, very complex", # LenínEnCNN
"We had talked a lot with Rafael Correa and he told me that 'the table was served'; it's a 'table served', but with nothing ", # LenínEnCNN
"The debt that was said did not exceed USD 27 billion, approximately 27% of GDP, exceeded USD 60 billion," # LenínEnCNN
"What happens is that it was disguised (the debt) of something else; all the institutions owed ", # LenínEnCNN
"Immediately we had to go to work, to solve", # LenínEnCNN
"He did not like (Rafael Correa) that I say it like that, he did not like to call #NationalDialogue", # LenínEnCNN
"Nowhere in the political ideology, as I remember, is it said that there is no need to dialogue", # LenínEnCNN
1/2 "Dialog not necessarily with the one who thinks the same, you have to fundamentally dialogue with the one who thinks differently ...", # LenínEnCNN
2/2 "... that feeds us extraordinarily the thoughts, the ideas, the concepts that we have", # LenínEnCNN
"Dialogue with everyone: with political, social movements; we even talk with @FFAAECUADOR, with @PoliciaEcuador ", # LenínEnCNN
"Product of the #National Dialogue we are receiving the proposals. It was made dialogue tables, of consultation ", # LenínEnCNN
"Yesterday, the #TributarioProductivoTributario presented me with more than 100 recommendations to improve the economic situation of the country", # LenínEnCNN
"The administrative, electoral, economic, social environment generally works for and for that", # LenínEnCNN
"The president is made to believe that he is the only one elected to govern and there is a somewhat strange deification," # LenínEnCNN
People who are obsessed with power believe themselves to be indispensable and do everything according to the next period, not the ideals, # LenínEnCNN

2/2 "... that social movements may manifest, their approval or rejection, in a free manner", # LenínEnCNN
"The situation became a bit sinister, I thought that if I had imbibed that need for change, I could do it", # LenínEnCNN

"I always stated that I did not agree with the re-election, that there should be greater freedom of expression", # LenínEnCNN

"I trust people: the principle of presumption of innocence, until the person is not guilty, is very valuable", # LenínEnCNN
"I assigned the vice president (Jorge Glas) the functions he asked me, which he said he was able to carry out," # LenínEnCNN
"Without prior notice (Jorge Glas) he sent me an extremely rude letter and what I did was remove the functions", # LenínEnCNN
"Withdrawing the functions to the vice president is a constitutional attribution", # LenínEnCNN
"When I was vice president of Rafael Correa I always respected him and he respected me", # LenínEnCNN
"When I left the vice presidency, the Mission 'Manuela Espejo' was immediately dismantled," # LenínEnCNN
I worry so little synderesis in the subsequent behavior: I respected the president when he dismantled the 'Manuela Espejo', # LenínEnCNN
"When irregularities were detected in the Central San Francisco, the Government -in an honest way- claimed and fined Odebrecht", # LenínEnCNN
